id: Unrest in Sweden							Unrest in Sweden
paragraph:
National ReviewFrom The Local: “A fist fight broke out at a performance of Gustav Mahler’s Symphony No.5 in Malmö on Thursday night, after a listener was sent into a rage by another rustling a bag of gum.”My agents are everywhere.NR's afternoon roundup of the day's best commentary & must-read analysis.
